data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Longino, John T. (2013): A review of the Central American and Caribbean species of the ant genus Eurhopalothrix Brown and Kempf, 1961 (Hymenoptera, Formicidae), with a key to New World species. Zootaxa 3693 (2): 101-151, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3693.2.1
